'Powder' is an Indian crime television series which first aired on Sony TV
January 3, 2010 and ran for one season. The story is of the new scenario in
substance abuse - a generation embracing drugs. Powder an insight of the durg
lord, Naved Ansari, and an honest team of Narotics Control Bureau led by Usmaan
Malik who plans to nab Ansari before he can hoodwink the system into letting him
go scott free.
